text: Kit and Kate (stylised as Kit ^n^ Kate; ) is a Russian-French-Italian-American series of animated shorts. ==Production== It was produced by Russian company Toonbox (whose animation studio and ABC Kids office were later respectively relocated to CyprusOur studio has moved to CyprusToonbox has moved to a new office), with a team of American, French and Russian artists. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Toonbox Animation Studio Category:2010s American animated television series Category:2010s French television series Category:American children's television series Category:French animated television series
title: Kit and Kate
